faq.question: How can I book a flight through the airline app?
faq.answer: To book a flight through our app, simply open the app, enter your travel details including departure city, destination, travel dates, and number of passengers. Browse through the available flights, select your preferred option, and proceed with the payment to confirm your booking.

faq.question: What documents do I need to carry while traveling?
faq.answer: You will need to carry a valid government-issued photo ID (such as a passport or driver's license) and your flight ticket. If you are traveling internationally, ensure you have the necessary visas and other required documents for your destination country.

faq.question: Can I check in online using the app?
faq.answer: Yes, you can check in online using our app. Simply log in to your account, select your upcoming flight, and follow the prompts to complete the online check-in process. Make sure to download your boarding pass or have it accessible on your phone for easy boarding at the airport.

faq.question: What is the baggage allowance for my flight?
faq.answer: Baggage allowance varies depending on your ticket type and destination. You can find detailed information about your baggage allowance in the 'My Bookings' section of the app. It's important to adhere to the specified weight and size limits to avoid additional charges.

faq.question: How can I make changes to my flight booking?
faq.answer: If you need to make changes to your flight booking, such as changing the travel dates or passenger names, you can do so through the 'My Bookings' section of the app. Please note that changes may be subject to fees and availability, so it's advisable to review our change policy before making modifications.

faq.question: What do I do if my flight is delayed or canceled?
faq.answer: In the event of a flight delay or cancellation, our airline will notify you via the app and/or email. You can check the updated flight status in the 'My Bookings' section. If your flight is canceled, you will be provided with options for rebooking or receiving a refund, depending on the circumstances.

faq.question: Is there Wi-Fi available on the flights?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer Wi-Fi services on many of our flights. You can check the availability of Wi-Fi for your specific flight during the booking process or by contacting our customer support. Keep in mind that Wi-Fi may not be available on all aircraft or routes.

faq.question: What amenities are provided on long-haul flights?
faq.answer: On long-haul flights, we provide complimentary meals, beverages, blankets, and entertainment options. Some aircraft are equipped with personal screens for each passenger, allowing you to enjoy movies, TV shows, and games. Check the details of your flight to know the specific amenities available.

faq.question: Can I request special meals for my dietary preferences?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a variety of special meals to accommodate different dietary preferences and restrictions. You can request special meals, such as vegetarian, vegan, kosher, or gluten-free, during the booking process or by contacting our customer service at least 24 hours before your scheduled departure.

faq.question: What should I do if I lose my baggage?
faq.answer: If your baggage is lost or delayed, please report it to our baggage services desk at the airport immediately. Our staff will assist you in filling out a report. You can also track the status of your lost baggage online through our website or app. We will make every effort to locate and return your baggage to you as soon as possible.

faq.question: Can I earn frequent flyer miles for my flights?
faq.answer: Yes, you can earn frequent flyer miles for eligible flights with our airline. Make sure to provide your frequent flyer number during the booking process or when checking in. Accumulated miles can be used for future flights, seat upgrades, and other travel benefits. Join our frequent flyer program to start earning rewards today.
